name: Colors (Pedro Marques)
description:
A game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 about the theme 'Stronger Together'.

It's a 2D puzzle-platformer where you must combine and separate colors (characters) in order to get stronger characters or achieve a certain color required to beat the level.

Music by : David Renda

Controls:

Arrow Keys
MovementS + Arrow Keys
Dash
D
Combine Colors
ASeparate Colors
RReset Level
E and Q
Swap Characters
